overview: Do you remember "Chinese Ghost Story"? Ning Caichen, who is the teacher of Lan Ruozhen, encounters Xiaoqian being chased by a spirit hunter, and Xiaoqian gets Ning Caichen rescued. Ning Caichen believes that spirits are also divided into good and evil, and that humans and spirits can live in peace. The helpless Spirit World Snake Spirit Grandma intends to resurrect Black Mountain, the leader of the dark forces that has been sealed for many years, and once again slay and dominate the human world. This is undoubtedly a disaster on earth. In order to protect the people from being overwhelmed by creatures, Ning Caichen decided to go to the boundary between humans and spirits. They joined hands to wipe out the forces of darkness, but they also gave their precious lives.
title: A Fairy Tale
